website_summaries.verdict: A waterproof mascara that's gentle and easy to remove when you're ready.
pros: Contains olive and almond oil to protect and hydrate your lashes
Brown and black shade looks natural on both dark and light lashes
Washes off easily without damaging lashes
cons: Doesn't provide much in the way of volume or length

customer_reviews.title: Definitely for sensitive eyes
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a mascara I can wear. I have contact allergies to many of the chemicals and even preservatives in make-up. I have tried numerous expensive natural, pure and hypoallergenic mascaras, only to find that within an hour my eyes are red, burning, itching, actually painful. I've spent hours researching MSDS sheets and eliminating mascaras. I wouldn't care if this mascara clumps, runs or smudges, as long as my eyes don't hurt. Well, this mascara causes no problems for me at all. Bravo!
customer_reviews.author: Diane L

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this mascara
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, this mascara. Being a natural blonde the brown black color is awesome. Most mascaras I buy in brown black are to dark. Also there is little to no clumping and is for a waterproof mascara fairly easy to remove with make up remover towelettes. It is also gentle on my skin and lashes. I've had problems in the past with mascara irritating the skin around my eyes, causing puffiness. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley S.

customer_reviews.title: I keep coming back to this mascara....
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is great, doesn't splatter all over my face. I can get all the tiny hairs as well as the long ones. Use coconut oil to remove and it does the job! I've tried other mascaras, even more expensive ones, but some of them make my eyes water and some just stink, that's why I changed from loreal to this a few years ago. Love this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Meggie Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Good product and shipping
customer_reviews.text: I like this mascara, it doesn't clump, is easy to apply, stays put. Fast shipping! THanks!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Kraak

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Good for beards. Set with hairspray so as not to smear on clothes.
customer_reviews.author: W. D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: This product seems dry and clumpy. It's almost like it's old. I have tried two different tubes and they are both the same. Not Impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite mascara. It goes on nice and comes off ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mascara. It goes on nice and comes off nice at night, yet does not smear when I cry.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy McKitrick

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive eyes
customer_reviews.text: Love this mascara. I have very sensitive eyes and it's the only kind that doesn't make my eyes itch.
customer_reviews.author: Mom.RN

customer_reviews.title: Flakey
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Product deposited flakes of fillers in my eyes. Cannot use and cannot return.
customer_reviews.author: K. O.

customer_reviews.title: THis is the best mascara I have used
customer_reviews.text: THis is the best mascara I have used. I have purchased it several times. I have very sensitive eyes and this is the only mascara I have used that does not irritate them. Goes on nicely and lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G. Simon

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t clump and stays on well through the day. Pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Korrie DeLaney MIller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great natural product that stays on all day with no smudging!
customer_reviews.author: LARZIG

customer_reviews.title: I like it when first applied but by the end of ...
customer_reviews.text: Dries out during the day and becomes flakey and irritates my eyes. I like it when first applied but by the end of the day, can't wait to remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Product didn’t come with the stopper
customer_reviews.text: The mascara came packaged and fine until I opened it and realized that the stopper was missing from the mascara. There is nothing preventing the mascara from all coming out when I pull out the brush. Mascara is unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Tetrault

customer_reviews.title: infected my eye
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it was old product or what but it hurt my eyes and I can't use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie J Fundukian

customer_reviews.title: Long and thick lashes
customer_reviews.text: The only mascara that does not cause an allergic reaction for me.
customer_reviews.author: tbirdtex

customer_reviews.title: Neutropenia mascara underwhelms
customer_reviews.text: Very minimal effect compared to more high end mascara so. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda W

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara
customer_reviews.text: My favorite mascara! They were sold out in the stores I went and then I found it cheaper here on amazon. So happy I found it and it came super fast. The only mascara that makes my lashes look nice and full and not clumpy. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Stays on, maybe too good
customer_reviews.text: I've only used mineral based, natural mascaras for several years, but I do get tired of some rubbing off or melting on hot days. This makes my little lashes look great. Ony negative, even with my go to coconut oil, it does not come off. I don't want to rub lashes hard and damage them.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Neutrogena is the best for me. I love the thickness of the mascara. The color and the staying power. Makeup is the same. I've had people comment on how my makeup doesn't look like I even have to touch it up after all day. I don't and it's this brand! I've had difficult finding the waterproof, black at Walgreens and other stores lately so came to my trusty Amazon store and wa-lah. There it is. Just adding it to my list of ongoing purchases from Amazon. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: MLB

customer_reviews.title: Not great for humidity
customer_reviews.text: It's fine to wear in California hot weather, but not in Vegas. It smeared under my bottom lashes. Guessing not great for humidity. Had me looking like a raccoon within an hour of wear in Vegas.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Kind Of Great
customer_reviews.text: This mascara (neutrogena waterproof volume) clumps less than every other mascara I've ever tried, especially if they are waterproof, but it still clumps a bit. Not sure if I'm weird but every mascara I've ever tried causes irritation, and this mascara is no different. Until I find a better mascara though this remains my go-to.
customer_reviews.author: T Feldblum

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: While this is called 'waterproof', it definitely is not. Not sure if I'd even call it water resistant. It leaves marks on my upper lid where my lashes touch, and racoon eyes underneath. I used it two days to say I tried it, threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: KiT136

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't smudge.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how this mascara does in the water, but it doesn't smudge under they eye after dripping hot yoga. I can also use my regular eye makeup remover with warm water.
customer_reviews.author: AFK

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this mascara initially. It was easy to apply, no clumping and lasted all day. However it started to dry out after only two weeks and I had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Allergy proof
customer_reviews.text: This is the only mascara I have used for 20 yrs! Never runs or smears! Main reason for buying this brand, no allergy issues!
customer_reviews.author: Louise E

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mascara
customer_reviews.text: This mascara goes on easily and stays all day. Color Black/Brown is nice. I'll buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is awful, and impossible to get off. It did absolutely nothing for my lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great Mascara Finally!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara! Makes lashes look long and lush while never clumping like every other brand I have tried even with a double coat and it's good for your lashes! I'm hooked and will be buying on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl B

customer_reviews.title: No upper lid transfer
customer_reviews.text: This mascara won’t stick to your upper lid like some do.
customer_reviews.author: Chris A.

customer_reviews.title: Not what expected
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof definitely leaves mascara all over the eye area
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Silky smooth no clumps
customer_reviews.text: Goes on nice and silky smooth...no clumps. I recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Scully - Vane

customer_reviews.title: Natural, doesn’t clump, lasts
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s more natural, doesn’t clump and lasts well
customer_reviews.author: Anita M Culp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice natural looking, just what I wanted. No clumps, no smudges.
customer_reviews.author: Marjory J. Connors

customer_reviews.title: gives good coverage, and although waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This goes on without clumping the lashes, gives good coverage, and although waterproof, it is easy to remove with makeup remover.
customer_reviews.author: Momegan

customer_reviews.title: Neutrogena products are high quality
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for quite a while and I trust it. Waterproof mascara is a must for me. Neutrogena cosmetic products that I've tried have been quality items.
customer_reviews.author: evb

customer_reviews.title: easy to take off with some
customer_reviews.text: use it daily/non irritant, easy to take off with some moisturizer
customer_reviews.author: Beata Viszmegh

customer_reviews.title: I love Neutrogena products
customer_reviews.text: I love Neutrogena products, but the mascara is dry and doesn't go on that well. Seems to be the problem with other mascaras also.
customer_reviews.author: Betty F.

customer_reviews.title: bad purchase for me.
customer_reviews.text: too hard to use for me-probably perfect for younger woman it was too heavy of a product for my eyes as it was smeary and I just use the wand without the product now to lighten my eyebrows
customer_reviews.author: Claire Pelletier

customer_reviews.title: Clumps & smudges
customer_reviews.text: This is the most clumping mascara I've ever used. Also, by the end of the day I have dark smudges under my eyes. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: gappers

product_meta.title: Neutrogena Cosmetics Healthy Volume Waterproof Mascara - Black/Brown (08)
product_meta.description: Size:1 ea| Color:Black/BrownNeutrogena Healthy Volume Mascara: Black Brown #08. Visible volume brush coats the lashes while plumping formula increases their volume. Healthy Volume Mascara by Neutrogena actually plumps the core of each lash while Sweet Almond helps protect. Produces 400% dramatically fuller lashes.
